
## d10 Active

```{r d10-active, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
d10a1 = read_d10a(file1, type1)
d10a2 = read_d10a(file2, type2)
d10a.diff = diff_d10a(d10a1, d10a2)
d10a.rmse.station = rmse_d10a(d10a.diff, "Station")
d10a.rmse.time = rmse_d10a(d10a.diff, "Time")

d10a.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_d10a) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("d10 Active Differences at Stations")
d10a.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_d10a) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("d10 Active RMSE at Stations")
d10a.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_d10a) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("d10 Active RMSE Through Time")
```
